title: Bug 116786: Library include should store relative path.
OB: The report design currently stores the absolute path of the library file. For example, in the property <property name="fileName">E:/birt/sampleReports/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary</property>.
EB: The report design should store the relative path of the library file instead of the absolute path. For example, it should be saved as <property name="fileName">../otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary</property>.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the BIRT designer.
2. Create a new report design in the folder $project/test.
3. Include a library file located in the folder $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary in the report design.
